title: Create a floppy image with winimage URGENT!!!

forumNotes.author: byt0ke
Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
Sorry ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif), we are on strike right now, please come back next monday.  

Maybe someone may want to help you on Winimage Forum:  
[http://www.winimage.info/forum/](http://www.winimage.info/forum/ "External link")  

where maybe ![:whistling:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/happy22.gif), if you search hard enough, you could find this:  
[http://www.winimage.....php?f=3\&t=3404](http://www.winimage.info/forum/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=3404 "External link")  

The general idea, in the morning, is it not to just get off the bed, you should also **wake up** and put a nice, friendly smile on your face, **and** avaoid to post "URGENT!" anywhere.  

Rule #12 and point #b of "common sense advice" attached to Rules are there for a REASON:  
[http://www.boot-land...?showtopic=9101](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?showtopic=9101 "External link")  

![:huh:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/huh.png)  

Wonko
